title: Control 1-4 (2011-2013) (Ongoing) [Webcomic]
description:
English | CBZ | 4 Issues

Control #1-4
Publication Date:  July 11, 2011 - June 9, 2013

Writer:  Matthew Meylikhov
Artist:  Kristin Boucher

Control is a webcomic created by Kristin Boucher and Matthew Meylikhov.  Control is 100% free and can be read at controlcomic.com.

Kristin Boucheris a 2004 graduate of Maine College of Art with a degree in New Media. An accountant by day and artist extraordinaire by night, she is known in her community for her graphic design capabilities as well as her talent as an actress. She co-created Control along with Matthew, and currently resides in the city of Boston with her boyfriend and affable feline companion.

Matthew Meylikhov is a 2010 graduate of the New England Institute of Art with a degree in Audio Engineering, after being told that a major in English with a focus on Creative Writing was not competitive enough by a different school. In his free time he works as Editor-In-Chief for the comic-based website Multiversity Comics, offering up daily news, reviews, and assorted columns. He co-created Control along with Kristin, and also resides in the city of Boston with his girlfriend and two cats who are under the impression that they are quite human.

Chapter 5 begins in September.
